messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Why?  Is it causing problems on Windows?
The first line is supposed to skip this test on Windows,
and it's still a useful test on Unix if we can keep
everything else working.

Russ

Yes, please see the Go Dashboard.
On Sep 27, 2011 1:57 PM, "Russ Cox" <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Why? Is it causing problems on Windows?
> The first line is supposed to skip this test on Windows,
> and it's still a useful test on Unix if we can keep
> everything else working.
>
> Russ

subject: code review 5136045: test: delete sigchld test
